# Sample S3P Files

This directory should contain sample S3P (3-port S-parameter) files for testing.

## Expected Files

- `sample.s3p` - Basic 3-port S-parameter file

## File Format

S3P files should be in Touchstone format (standard S-parameter file format).

## Note

Actual S-parameter files are binary/text data files. For now, this directory serves as a placeholder.
When implementing Phase 1, create actual S3P files using scikit-rf or obtain real test data.
